name: Moby Dick
text: Your Turn Once Per Turn When one of your characters with {Whitebeard Pirates} included in its types leaves play from an effect, Draw 1 card and place 1 card from your hand on the top or bottom of your deck.

effect.text: When one of your characters with {Whitebeard Pirates} included in its types leaves play from an effect, Draw 1 card and place 1 card from your hand on the top or bottom of your deck.
conditions: one of your characters with {Whitebeard Pirates} included in its types
